Specimen Type: Clinical specimens such as sputum, bronchial washes, tissues, body fluids, urine, skin/nail scrapings, and hair
Purpose: To culture and accurately identify fungi present in clinical specimens to aid in patient diagnosis and management.
Equipment: Fungal culture media (Sabouraud Dextrose Agar, Mycosel Agar, Dermatophyte Test Medium), incubator (25–30 °C), light microscope, PCR thermocycler, MALDI-TOF mass spectrometer
